website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for customers wishing to extend a sunless or UV tan at a cheaper price.
pros: Customers love that it works for both sun and sunless tanning
cons: Some users said it made very little difference, while others said the tan washed off

customer_reviews.title: California Tan Extender with Bronzers
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product made by one of the top manufacturers in the field of tanning. It has a pleasant scent and easy to apply. It gives you a nice sun glow which is extremely natural looking. I just feel that it is very expensive for the amount of product that you receive. However, it is cheaper on Amazon than most other places.
customer_reviews.author: lab

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lotion to extend my spray tans for over a year now, and I love this one. It smells great and does seem to extend my tan for at least 2 days. It also is good for evening out lighter areas that may have gotten wet after the spray. I was very happy to find it much cheaper here than at the salon, and I plan to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Aerodoc

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff So glad I found on here, normally I have to go to a tanning salon for it and pay double
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua mama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brown tan from this extender!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tan extender. I don’t normally use it as an at home extended but use it in the tanning bed and it’s amazing. I really have a beautiful brown tan, no orange or strange tint, beautiful brown!! I’ll continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Young

customer_reviews.title: Smells Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about a year. I originally bought it at the tanning salon, for a pretty penny. It smells great, which is a plus for me. Any self tan, bronzing products have a terrible smell to me. This smells great, and never gets that nasty self tanner scent.
customer_reviews.author: mt613

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff, Helps Tan Last Longer
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! I've used this lotion before when I used to tan in tanning beds. It does have a very, very slight color and I feel that it made my tan lasts longer than if I just applied a regular body lotion on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and has great color
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and goes on smooth without smearing. It helps to moisturize my spray on tan which is great. It has a great color and doesn't turn me orange. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This tan extender by far beats all the others I have tried. It smells good and leaves your skin nourished, along with helping extend your tan. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyrenae

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extends my sunless tan over a weekend and into the next week.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Reckles

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: don't like it because i feel sticky after i put this on
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Robbins

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this brand is great , a must have for tanners and fake tanners , this product works great , it does extend the life of your tan
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: much cheaper on here than salons
customer_reviews.text: I like this after-sunless lotion....does just fine for me and I'm a guy....not going to pay huge bucks to buy something else....well pleased and will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was hoping for. I did not notice any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: great buy! !
customer_reviews.text: Just the same at what you get at the salon but for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Redd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion for my mystic spray tans I get from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's to thick and the color is off for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mokee

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Works and smells great. Perfect for any type of tanning, even sunless. Price is half of what you would pay in a tanning salon.
customer_reviews.author: Blondebella

customer_reviews.title: Great feel on your skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great daily lotion to keep your tan looking good. It is also great in the winter when you want just a little something to take the "glare" off. It will not make you dark - just a little warmer skin toned. And it does not feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts on face
customer_reviews.text: I have recently been spray tanning once a week and was looking for a product to prolong the life of my tan. So far I really enjoy how it develops a nice tint on my body, however, when I used it on my face it caused me to break out. Will probably try another product once this is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it - works best if you already have a nice base tan
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: My new Go-to lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked CT products, I've been bed tanning off and on for several years and everything they have is great including this lotion. I use a tan extender every single night and I've been using the Australian Gold blue bottle that has great reviews. I almost like this one better because of the scent, texture, and added bronzers. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this after I tan. It really helps keep my color. I also use it after shaving if I'm go by to wear shorts. It makes my skin feel so soft. AND has a pleasant scent that's not strong at all.
customer_reviews.author: LSC

customer_reviews.title: Nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizing lotion with the benefit of a hint of self-tanner. It doesn't have an overwhelming tanner smell, which makes it even better. Bought it at my tanning salon for almost triple the price I found on Amazon and the products are the same.
customer_reviews.author: KWshopper

customer_reviews.title: Didn't feel like I saw that much of a difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after getting a spray tan for an event. I was told it would keep the tan. Didn't feel like I saw that much of a difference, though it did make my skin soft!
customer_reviews.author: Ellycit

customer_reviews.title: Smells good! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Keeps your tan looking great for a longer amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love the gradual tan it creates when I'm not spray ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the gradual tan it creates when I'm not spray tanning regularly. This also helps my spray tan appear more even as it is fading. Love the smell as well. The price is half the cost at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne A.

customer_reviews.title: California Tan extender
customer_reviews.text: Just not really impressed in it keeping or lengthening the color of my tan. Would not buy again. Not worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: The Hailey's

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, but leaves no color and dries skin out.
customer_reviews.author: VWilson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product to extend the life of your spray or lotion tan. smells great. leaves skin feeling soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: D. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, helps enhance color plus, iprevents your tan from fading.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product a lot, but wish it was a bigger size to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: not all its cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: i was disappointed by this product. says it has bronzers but clearly doesnt. didnt last long compared to other lotions i like. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Love this in the summer. I can't get in the sun so I use a "fake tanner" and this in between. Nice smell. Tricks me into thinking I'm at the beach. Keeps "tan" longer and moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

product_meta.title: California Tan Extender with Bronzers, 6 Ounce | Enhances & Protects Tan for Both Sunless and UV Results | Cruelty Free
product_meta.description: Drenches skin in a hydrating combination of Aloe Vera and Shea Butter with Olive and Sunflower Seed Oils to visibly improve skin tone and texture.
feature_bullets: Lavish Skin: Hydrated with aloe vera, sunflower oil and shea butter
Bronzextend Blend: Combines DHA and erythrulose for dark color
Breakthrough: Fragrance technology eliminates odors at the source
Extends: Both sunless and UV results

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
